message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would you consider reducing the price to meet my budget?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget of $8,000. Could we possibly reach an agreement closer to that amount?
